TestSteps:
1) Log in as wholesaler.
2) Create listing with 3–5 images.
3) Save and open listing detail.
ExpectedResult: Images upload and display correctly in gallery.

TestSteps:
1) Upload unsupported or huge image.
2) Save listing.
ExpectedResult: Invalid files rejected; valid ones save normally.

TestSteps:
1) Edit listing.
2) Remove one image and add another.
3) Save.

ExpectedResult: Images visible read-only; no edit/delete controls.
Page loads with metrics; no errors.

TestSteps:
1) Open alerts in 2 sessions.
2) Create alert in session B.
ExpectedResult: Session A updates in realtime or on refresh.
Properties load; deleted ones handled gracefully.
Dashboard loads with metrics; no NaN/undefined.

TestSteps:
1) Perform test checkout.
2) Verify DB subscription.

1) Upgrade plan via portal.
2) Verify DB.

1) Cancel.
2) Wait for event.
3) Check UI.
ExpectedResult: Subscription marked canceled; restricted features locked.
Status moves to past_due; UI reflects correctly.
No duplicate records; idempotent behavior working.
